body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our Car Dealership customer service. My name is Robert Martinez, how may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Robert, I'm Ann Walker. I need help with a recent service appointment.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hi Ann, thank you for reaching out. Can you provide me with your phone number so I can locate your appointment details?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, six seven eight, nine zero one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Ann. I also need your home address to verify your account. Can you share your complete address with me, including the zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my address is two three four Oak Street, Cityville, State, one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information. I'll look up your appointment details now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I found your appointment record, Ann. Is there anything specific you need assistance with regarding your service appointment?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, everything has been resolved. I'm feeling relieved now. Thank you for your help, Robert.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Ann. If you have any further questions or concerns in the future, feel free to reach out. Thank you for contacting us and have a great day!
